name: Gengari
description:
Gengari

Gengari is a very short, sort of obscure RPG that was put together for fun as a first RPGMaker MV project to begin to learn the software. A couple of friends (who gave lots of feedback on this one, along with my wife) and I are planning on creating a much bigger, traditional epic-type rpg that includes many of the RPGMaker community's major battle and customization plug-ins, replacing any ridiculous enemy jpegs with real artwork, etc.

I hope you enjoy it!**WARNING**

I'd steer clear of this game if you really can't stand the sight of clowns, but encourage you to try it if the thought of attacking them ruthlessly is appealing.

**SPOILERS**

There is at least one obscure secret that I'll be surprised if anyone finds in the inn, and an optional boss in the last room -if you don't gun for the end of the game- that will take some time/grinding to get to and defeat.
